title: Victorian medicine
itunes:title: Victorian medicine
itunes:subtitle: Dr Lindsey Fitzharris, author of The Butchering Art, delves into the terrifying world of 19th-century hospitals and shows how scientific advances eventually led to dramatic improvements
description:
